name: Tiara of the Oracle
tooltip:
Tiara of the OracleLevel 60

Bring Vek'nilash's Circlet, 2 Idols of the Sage, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Bone Scarabs to Andorgos in Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Friendly reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Vek'nilash's Circlet
- Idol of the Sage x 2
- Silver Scarab x 5
- Bone Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
